it.unimib.disco.essere.core

Class ClassificationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimib.disco.essere.core.Handler
      • it.unimib.disco.essere.core.ClassificationHandler

  • public class ClassificationHandler
extends Handler
    Class for execute all the operations concerning: the building and serialization of the classifiers, the printing of the human-readable result, the cross validation and the weka experiment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassificationHandler(Loader loader, java.lang.String path)
      Create an instance of a ClassificationHandler

      Perform a cross validation
      void customExp(int runs, int folds)
      Perform a custom experiment, which is basically a standard weka experiment where folds are created before the execution and then executed concurrently
      java.util.ArrayList<weka.classifiers.Classifier> getClassifiers()
      The getter of the classifiers
      void load(java.lang.String path)
      Load the configuration file
      void printClassifier()
      Print on screen the summary of all the classifiers contained by the list classifiers (the first attribute)
      void saveClassifier()
      Save the summary of all the classifiers contained by the list classifiers (the first attribute) It save them in the path specified by the configuration file or in the fold .
      void serialize()
      Serialize all the classifiers contained by the list classifiers (the first attribute) It save the serialized file in the path specified by the configuration file or in the fold .

      • customExp

        public void customExp(int runs,
                      int folds)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a custom experiment, which is basically a standard weka experiment where folds are created before the execution and then executed concurrently
        Parameters:
        runs - how many times the the cross validation has to be repeted
        folds - number of fold used by the cross validation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • wekaExperiment

        public void wekaExperiment(java.lang.String exptype,
                           java.lang.String splittype,
                           int runs,
                           int folds,
                           double percentage,
                           boolean randomized)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a standard weka experiment
        Parameters:
        exptype - the type of experiment: classification or regression
        splittype - the type of split: crossvalidation or randomsplit
        runs - how many times the the split has to be repeted
        folds - number of fold used by the cross validation
        percentage - how many instances has to used for the creation of the training set in the randomsplit
        randomized - if the instances used for the creating the training and testing set in the randomsplit has to be randomized first
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • crossValidation

        public void crossValidation(int folds,
                            int seed)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a cross validation
        Parameters:
        folds - number of fold used by the cross validation
        seed - the number used by the Random class for splitting the instances (usually is used 1)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
